org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Interface StreamLimiter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FSEditLogLoader.PositionTrackingInputStream

    interface StreamLimiter
    An object that allows you to set a limit on a stream. This limit represents the number of bytes that can be read without getting an exception.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearLimit()
      Disable limit.
      void setLimit(long limit)
      Set a limit.

    • Method Detail

      • setLimit

        void setLimit(long limit)
        Set a limit. Calling this function clears any existing limit.

      • clearLimit

        void clearLimit()
        Disable limit.
